nodes.long_description:
{576958931641921}

Sires! __Dungeon Maker__ is a mixed reality sandbox game where you shape the adventure! Take control to build and customize every detail, or effortlessly generate endless dungeons (currently in __BETA__). 

Whether you create by hand or let the system do the work, prepare to explore traps, face enemies, and uncover quests in your own immersive dungeons.

This is a work-in-progress with regular updates and fixes. 

Join my Discord to share feedback and ideas: www.DUNGEON-MAKER.com
# -
# GENERATE INFINITE DUNGEONS!  (BETA)
The dungeon foundation is created from your Meta rooms setup, then generate as many dungeons as you like!
{1964062794072551}

# SET DEADLY TRAPS AND QUESTS
Plenty of traps and quest items to place around your home. Keys and doors, plots and treasures, deadly pits, swinging axes, skeletons!
{884487527165107}

# FIND THE TREASURE!
Can you go deep enough into the dungeon to retrieve the treasure?
{492385469938846}
nodes.short_description: Generate your own Dungeon in your home using Passthrough!

nodes.long_description:
Greetings My Lord ! 👑

I hath heard thou art quite the dungeon connoisseur, so i maketh this bawbling passthrough system where thee can buildeth thy owneth dungeon using a variety of traps and items, as well as lodging waypoints to giveth goals to the dungeon seekers. 🏰

What can I expect from my dungeon??
Fear not Sire, there is much:
1️⃣ Proceduraly generated plot and a treasure to go with it.
2️⃣ Hand tracking and presence! Use your hands to bring up your Orb of Quests as well as interact with the world.
3️⃣ A variety of slashing, crushing and deadly traps.
4️⃣ Lava floor!
5️⃣ Quest items such as waypoints and keys (that open doors).
6️⃣ Occlusion boxes to occlude your own furniture.
7️⃣ Walls to build around your dungeon.
8️⃣ A save / load system so you don't need to keep rebuilding each time! (Even tough it's fun to build, let's be honest.)
nodes.short_description: Build your own Dungeon in your home using Passthrough!

nodes.change_log:
Sire, please find all the release notes here! If you want a bit more details on what I did do check the posts on the game store page.

Version 0.40
- Generated Dungeons (BETA): You now have the option to generate a dungeon in your current room. It's still a work in progress, will be updating regularly. Check store post for more details.
- If slabs are in lava, they will sink slowly shortly after being stepped on. They come back up after a while! So plan your crossings wisely Sire.
- Added a minimum and maximum height for everything that adjusts to player height, like the lift buttons and the plot! (Oh, you thought that you so happened to be the perfect height for everything? ^^).

Version 0.39
- New item placement indicator so you can see where items will spawn before selecting them.
- New trap: slicer.
- New gore setting. Enable this in settings (disabled by default). First effect that has been added is your hands can get chopped off by blades.
- New item placement indicator. It's simple, but useful. Now when you hover over items it'll indicate where it'll be placed (floor, wall, ceiling).
- Axe trap now has some weight, so it's swing is much more pendulum like.
- Fixed issue with skeletons colliding with player as an obstacle instead of attacking in some instances.

Version 0.38
- New item: skin swap. Place it in your dungeon to allow changing dungeon skin during your adventuring.
- Added some editing sounds when spawning, grabbing and releasing objects.
- Fixed issue where you were unable to add a new treasure after loading a dungeon in some instances.
- Fixed issue with skeleton patrol spawning under floor when loading a save.
- Fixed issue with dungeon cell bars flickering through wall in some instances.

Version 0.37
- New item: Dungeon Lift. Add as many dungeons as you like as lift buttons, to travel back and forth between them!
- Cross-dungeon progress. You can now see all the quests for all the dungeons that are linked together either via portals or lifts.
- Dungeon cells. These cells are randomly spawned on walls where there is room for them, adding a bit more depth and story to the dungeons.
- Improved window design to add more thickness to the frame and cleaner bars.
- Flattened the Stone Floor item so it's lower than wood plank and stone slab height, but still higher than lava.
- Changed audio for dungeon end (once you have completed all quests) and added a festive celebration!
- Update save menu layout so it's cleaner on the first page. Now all loading/duplicating/deleting is done under "save files".

Version 0.36
- Skeleton animations are now much smooth when switching states.
- Skeleton Guard placement is easier now, there's a white outline to show the area it defends. If the player enters this area, the guard will go towards the player, and once it reaches the player it will attack. Leave the space and the skeleton will watch the player for a bit then return to the center of it's guard zone.
- Sekeleton Patrol now doesn't collide with player (this was a bug), so it will attack when making contact with the player instead of avoiding them. After the player has been attacked and moved away, the Skeleton Patrol will also watch the player for a bit before resuming his path.
- Dungeon Portal transition is faster and smoother, making travelling between dungeons much more immersive overall.
- Fixed issue where after deleting a Plot and Treasure item, you could no longer place a new one. (Thanks to @minecraftmint141)
- Fixed issue with particles on waypoints and start items rotating strangely relative to player head direction.
- Waypoint item color is now the same as Start item color (in preparation for a future update). 
- Removed transparent sphere effect around key.
- Fixed issue with some traps rendering in front of waypoints or portals when they were behind. (Thanks to @subjekt_niklas)

Version 0.35
- Dungeon Skin DLCs: Tomb Dungeon and Arctic Dungeon. (Dungeon skins are saved with your dungeon, so when you load a dungeon that dungeons skin will be loaded as well and will overide your current selected skin.)
- Fixed patrol skeleton facing wrong way when walking after loading a dungeon.
- Improved seams along walls when using the extended floor/ceilings.
- Fixed the black depth effect on walls/floor to always be the same height no matter the size of the room. (previously if you have higher ceilings that usual, this would cause issues. But now the depth of the floor will always be the same - 2.25metres deep).
 - Fixed issue with certain FX rendering behind walls when they were placed in front of them.

Version 0.34.1
- updated most textures with some ambient occlusion, so they are slightly better looking overall.
- fixed issue item pointer grabbed stopping to work in some instances.(Thanks to @foamymouthdog)
- the "Stone Floor" item is now a safe zone!(Thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas)
- fixed issue with skeleton guard scaling weirdly when scaling the floor space he can move in.
- fixed issue where if the device goes to sleep and then you resumed the game after, the pointer would have the wrong origin in some instances. 
- fixed numerous texture scaling issues (especially those from the "Stone Wall" item).
- fixed issue with hands sometimes being occlude by items. (Thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas)

Version 0.34
- Limited time menu with 3 new items for the Christmas season and a toggle for adding a festive feel to some items and the skybox.
- You can now use the dungeon portal to travel through as many dugeons as you have available! (thanks for @FictionX)
- Redesigned the Start and Waypoint items.
- Added a version code in the settings menu, to easily check while troubleshooting.
- Items that come in pairs can now be seperated into different rooms! (thanks to @Schniedelfighter)
- Patrol skeleton now detects obstacles in front of it and will turn around instead of walking through (thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas). Will keep testing dungeon layouts and update accordingly to make sure the obstacles avoidance has the desired effect in all instances.
- Floor and ceiling height changes are now saved properly per room.
- Fixed a bug where the controller tips would stay attached to the hands when switching to hand tracking. (thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas).
- Updated size of the bricks on the stone wall item so they arethe same scale as the wall bricks.
- Updated dungeon portal frame design so it's similar to the room portal.
- Fixed an issue where in instances wouldn't be able to move the lava or stone floor items after having moved them once. 
- The item placement laser pointer now renders above everything.
- [V1] Attempted a fix for an issue with the item placement pointer becoming unresponsive and/or unsuable in some instances. (thanks to @Schniedelfighter & @Subjekt_Niklas). Will keep monitoring this one.

Version 0.33
- A new menu option under edit called "room modifiers" where you can make the floor lower and the ceiling higher!
- 2 new items: wood beam and stone floor to go with the new lower floor mode.
- Optimization: only the room you are in will be enabled. No more rendering rooms you aren't currently in!
- A redesigned save system (backend but still worth noting, work is work ^^);
- Added a "NEW" indicator on new features in the menu. To find the latest stuff quicker Sire!
- Saved dungeons order is inverted now so the latest dungeons appear at the top. No more scrolling if you have 100s of dungeons like I do...
- Fixed rendering order issues in some areas, like portals, hands and holes.
- Fixed where the (purple) dungeon portal spawns, as they previously would spawn in the center of the room. If your room was L shaped, that center may be out of view.
- Duplicate now works on lava and skeletons.
- Fixed issue with pointer toggling between menu and world items. It was sometimes hard to click the tabs without interacting with the dungeon walls at the same time.

Version 0.32
- Added windows that see into the exerior bleak world!
- Changed room portal design, added frame and is blocked off if there's no connecting room setup.
- Added loading screen on menu when loading or starting a new dungeon.

Version 0.31
- 90FPS on Quest3/3S!
- Redesigned the menu from the ground up.
- You can now easily switch between left/right handed in the new menu settings.
- Settings also include toggling controller button tips!
- Added 3D controllers while in the menu for easier visiblity, and for tips to make sense.
- Added function to duplicate items directly, no need to keep going back to the menu!
- The dungeon foundation now includes all rooms instead of just current room. 
- A portal is placed on your doors that lead to another setup room, though make sure your physical doors are open ^^. (Try blocking access to the portal with the Door & Key quest item!)
- Added particles effects to certain items like the key, treasure and waypoints.
- The app is now boundaryless, which means you no longer need see or setup a boundary to use it. Really helps when going through multiple rooms!
- There's also a tab in the menu with some of my other games, check them out!
- You can no longer portal to the current dungeon, a message will warn you that you are selecting the same dungeon.
- Creating a new dungeon doesn't increment the dungeon number until it's been saved.
- Removed the limit to how many Dungeons you can save.
- When you start a dungeon adventure, it'll be automatically saved.
- You now have to place the Starting point
- Ceiling traps now snap to the ceiling so it's easier to drag and place them correctly.

Sire, please find all the release notes here! If you want a bit more details on what I did do check the posts on the game store page.

- fixed issue with hands sometimes being occlude by items. (Thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas)

Version 0.34
- Limited time menu with 3 new items for the Christmas season and a toggle for adding a festive feel to some items and the skybox.
- You can now use the dungeon portal to travel through as many dugeons as you have available! (thanks for @FictionX)
- Redesigned the Start and Waypoint items.
- Added a version code in the settings menu, to easily check while troubleshooting.
- Items that come in pairs can now be seperated into different rooms! (thanks to @Schniedelfighter)
- Patrol skeleton now detects obstacles in front of it and will turn around instead of walking through (thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas). Will keep testing dungeon layouts and update accordingly to make sure the obstacles avoidance has the desired effect in all instances.
- Floor and ceiling height changes are now saved properly per room.
- Fixed a bug where the controller tips would stay attached to the hands when switching to hand tracking. (thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas).
- Updated size of the bricks on the stone wall item so they arethe same scale as the wall bricks.
- Updated dungeon portal frame design so it's similar to the room portal.
- Fixed an issue where in instances wouldn't be able to move the lava or stone floor items after having moved them once. 
- The item placement laser pointer now renders above everything.
- [V1] Attempted a fix for an issue with the item placement pointer becoming unresponsive and/or unsuable in some instances. (thanks to @Schniedelfighter & @Subjekt_Niklas). Will keep monitoring this one.

Version 0.33
- A new menu option under edit called "room modifiers" where you can make the floor lower and the ceiling higher!
- 2 new items: wood beam and stone floor to go with the new lower floor mode.
- Optimization: only the room you are in will be enabled. No more rendering rooms you aren't currently in!
- A redesigned save system (backend but still worth noting, work is work ^^);
- Added a "NEW" indicator on new features in the menu. To find the latest stuff quicker Sire!
- Saved dungeons order is inverted now so the latest dungeons appear at the top. No more scrolling if you have 100s of dungeons like I do...
- Fixed rendering order issues in some areas, like portals, hands and holes.
- Fixed where the (purple) dungeon portal spawns, as they previously would spawn in the center of the room. If your room was L shaped, that center may be out of view.
- Duplicate now works on lava and skeletons.
- Fixed issue with pointer toggling between menu and world items. It was sometimes hard to click the tabs without interacting with the dungeon walls at the same time.

Version 0.32
- Added windows that see into the exerior bleak world!
- Changed room portal design, added frame and is blocked off if there's no connecting room setup.
- Added loading screen on menu when loading or starting a new dungeon.

Version 0.31
- 90FPS on Quest3/3S!
- Redesigned the menu from the ground up.
- You can now easily switch between left/right handed in the new menu settings.
- Settings also include toggling controller button tips!
- Added 3D controllers while in the menu for easier visiblity, and for tips to make sense.
- Added function to duplicate items directly, no need to keep going back to the menu!
- The dungeon foundation now includes all rooms instead of just current room. 
- A portal is placed on your doors that lead to another setup room, though make sure your physical doors are open ^^. (Try blocking access to the portal with the Door & Key quest item!)
- Added particles effects to certain items like the key, treasure and waypoints.
- The app is now boundaryless, which means you no longer need see or setup a boundary to use it. Really helps when going through multiple rooms!
- There's also a tab in the menu with some of my other games, check them out!
- You can no longer portal to the current dungeon, a message will warn you that you are selecting the same dungeon.
- Creating a new dungeon doesn't increment the dungeon number until it's been saved.
- Removed the limit to how many Dungeons you can save.
- When you start a dungeon adventure, it'll be automatically saved.
- You now have to place the Starting point
- Ceiling traps now snap to the ceiling so it's easier to drag and place them correctly.

Sire, please find all the release notes here! If you want a bit more details on what I did do check the posts on the game store page.

Version 0.36
- Skeleton animations are now much smooth when switching states.
- Skeleton Guard placement is easier now, there's a white outline to show the area it defends. If the player enters this area, the guard will go towards the player, and once it reaches the player it will attack. Leave the space and the skeleton will watch the player for a bit then return to the center of it's guard zone.
- Sekeleton Patrol now doesn't collide with player (this was a bug), so it will attack when making contact with the player instead of avoiding them. After the player has been attacked and moved away, the Skeleton Patrol will also watch the player for a bit before resuming his path.
- Dungeon Portal transition is faster and smoother, making travelling between dungeons much more immersive overall.
- Fixed issue where after deleting a Plot and Treasure item, you could no longer place a new one. (Thanks to @minecraftmint141)
- Fixed issue with particles on waypoints and start items rotating strangely relative to player head direction.
- Waypoint item color is now the same as Start item color (in preparation for a future update). 
- Removed transparent sphere effect around key.
- Fixed issue with some traps rendering in front of waypoints or portals when they were behind. (Thanks to @subjekt_niklas)

Version 0.35
- Dungeon Skin DLCs: Tomb Dungeon and Arctic Dungeon. (Dungeon skins are saved with your dungeon, so when you load a dungeon that dungeons skin will be loaded as well and will overide your current selected skin.)
- Fixed patrol skeleton facing wrong way when walking after loading a dungeon.
- Improved seams along walls when using the extended floor/ceilings.
- Fixed the black depth effect on walls/floor to always be the same height no matter the size of the room. (previously if you have higher ceilings that usual, this would cause issues. But now the depth of the floor will always be the same - 2.25metres deep).
 - Fixed issue with certain FX rendering behind walls when they were placed in front of them.

Version 0.34.1
- updated most textures with some ambient occlusion, so they are slightly better looking overall.
- fixed issue item pointer grabbed stopping to work in some instances.(Thanks to @foamymouthdog)
- the "Stone Floor" item is now a safe zone!(Thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas)
- fixed issue with skeleton guard scaling weirdly when scaling the floor space he can move in.
- fixed issue where if the device goes to sleep and then you resumed the game after, the pointer would have the wrong origin in some instances. 
- fixed numerous texture scaling issues (especially those from the "Stone Wall" item).
- fixed issue with hands sometimes being occlude by items. (Thanks to @Subjekt_Niklas)
